Sentencas: Recent investigations have revealed that the Ruddlesden-Popper series (A(n+1)B(n)O(3n+1)) and the layered perovskite LnBaCo(2)O(5+delta) (Ln = rare-earth cations) are promising as cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: OPTIMIZING OXYGEN DIFFUSION IN CATHODE MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELLS

Sentencas: For these to be economical the oxygen diffusion must be maximized.
Titulo: OPTIMIZING OXYGEN DIFFUSION IN CATHODE MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELLS

Sentencas: Based on atomistic simulations, we propose strategies for optimizing oxygen diffusion in these materials by modifying the oxygen stoichiometry, the composition and cation disorder.
Titulo: OPTIMIZING OXYGEN DIFFUSION IN CATHODE MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELLS

Sentencas: The present investigation is focused on La2CoO4+delta and GdBaCo2O5+delta and the results are discussed in view of recent experimental and theoretical studies.
Titulo: OPTIMIZING OXYGEN DIFFUSION IN CATHODE MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELLS
